input.sentences: today 's cleaning job was at the abandoned hospital .
it had been awhile since it was in use . the sides of the building looked grimy .
there were holes where the roof fell in on some of the floors .
just cleaning half a floor filled up one of the giant trash bins outside .
good thing they gave a long deadline for the job . this allowed us to take a nice break and play some basketball .
output.sentences: We had a job that involved us cleaning a hospital.
The roof and floors had a lot of holes.
The trash was giant that we only filled half.
After we did a nice job we played some ball.
